byline.contributor: Sydney Ember and Emily Steel contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: The difficulties of defending tough reporting and shielding journalists from powerful antagonists can be hard for any corporation to stomach. And AT&T has no journalistic lineage.

headline.print_headline: Suitor Says CNN to Stay Independent on the News
headline.main: With AT&T-Time Warner Deal Brewing, a Focus on Preserving CNN’s Integrity

snippet: The difficulties of defending tough reporting and shielding journalists from powerful antagonists can be hard for any corporation to stomach. And AT&T has no journalistic lineage....
abstract: Pending merger between AT&T and Time Warner is creating anxiety about journalistic integrity of CNN, cable news stalwart which will come under leadership of global communication behemoth if deal is completed; AT&T chief exec Randall Stephenson attempts to allay concerns by pledging to respect news network's editorial independence.
